title: Kha'Zix is both the weakest and most difficult champ in the game
body:
I just love how it's literally impossible for the enemy to get isolated against Kha in teamfights, cut that radius in half for fuck sake, nobody asked for it to get increased in the first place.

And why the hell doesn't his passive scale of AD and deal physical damage? It hasn't been useful ever since they removed the proc from his W.

I'm tired of the most skillful champ being a trash-tier Jungler with 44% winrate.

#BRING BACK MIDLANE K6
